Reviews.Title: “enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: mectron
Reviews.Content: booked 3 nights honest enjoyed spacious thoroughly clean bathroom considering temperature outside zero beautifully heated 2 radiators impressions fifth floor looks little rough edges definitely breakfast morning varied buffet types food gripe constant queueing coffee machine reminds queues toaster central checkpoint charlie 5 mins walk schoenefeld airport train 3 euros 35 euros cab purchase ticket various machines scattered station walk train station platform 6 catch train berlin station exit walk ito checkpoint charlie left walk hotel axel springer walk wrong direction river walk takes 30 mins airport station platform 1 train airport enjoy vacation

Reviews.Title: “Berlin at christmas time”
Reviews.Author: gchc_11
Reviews.Content: value money hotel arrived late night due flight timings met pleasant welcome hotel start stay basic clean breakfast provided bar late night evening drink doesnt bar hotel information dont expect visiting berlin city transport system getting easy christmas markets probably wouldnt stay hotel receptionist encountered seek alternative employment impression visitors

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for visiting Berlin”
Reviews.Author: batmaing
Reviews.Content: booked nights hotel 3 people pleased stay street sections berlin wall near 5 minutes walk stelle dedicated peter 5 minutes past friedrichstraße checkpoint charlie 5 10 minutes past section berlin wall topography terror documentation center 5 minutes axel springer street spittelmarkt tube station list hotel wonderful home base trip berlin day city welcomed spacious 3 person anyway clean warm personally rapport staff despite language barrier staff lot nodding key words cant fix youre looking live hotel admittedly serve purpose theres outside

Reviews.Title: “If you like rude staff, stay here.”
Reviews.Author: samsig
Reviews.Content: dont care clean hotel breakfast youre served served staff shockingly rude evenings chatting telephone russian staring blankly wondering reason possibly dare interrupt social calls pretending dont speak english dont deal nuisance yourself favor stay else hotels berlin service unbelievably bad hotel sign trip advisor account write review unemployment rate rapidly approaching 20 city snarky receptionists hotel wellserved learn manners basic customer service

Reviews.Title: “Cheap option, but wouldn't stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: Astra_TheatreLover
Reviews.Content: arrived outside hotel 830 night bit trouble finding entrance main entrance abandoned locked moments looking realised hotel 5th 6th floor building hotel wasnt building expect reception waited reception 40 minutes devastated leaving hotel look late finally woman 40 minutes waiting wouldnt speak english trouble communicating basic questions breakfast times etc bad impression finally arrived hotel relieved nicely decorated clean breakfast sleep quality morning wasnt hear people extent breakfast buffet delicious service staff wasnt friendly helpful times sometimes didnt feel welcome expectations professional pictures hotels website slightly misleading impression beyond negative service didnt rise expectations afterwards cheap option wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: KoshKoshka
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights pretty basic pay clean breakfast fine hotel managed russian people russian salad olivier example breakfast sandwiches caviar 20 mins walk alexanderplatz basically close exactly 7 mins walk metro station spittelmarkt lots construction moment look kinda circle pass

Reviews.Title: “confortable accomodation!”
Reviews.Author: Wonderwhale
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights hotel confortable location fast main attractions eg checkpoint charlie tidy clean noise breakfast reach genuine reception english speaking helpful rent bike main airport using tube
